alert.note: Alert for Daniels; Northern Valley; Sheridan (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 11:27PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Daniels, eastern Valley and northwestern Sheridan Counties through 1230 AM MDT... At 1126 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Peerless, or 15 miles west of Scobey, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scobey, Flaxville, Redstone, Whitetail, Madoc, Peerless, Daleview, Four Buttes, West Fork and Navajo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
